name: istanbul
comment: HF targeted for October 2019 following the Constantinople/Petersburg HF

blake2bRound.d: Gas cost per round for the Blake2b F precompile

ecAdd.d: Gas costs for curve addition precompile

ecMul.d: Gas costs for curve multiplication precompile

ecPairing.d: Base gas costs for curve pairing precompile

ecPairingWord.d: Gas costs regarding curve pairing precompile input length

txDataNonZero.d: Per byte of data attached to a transaction that is not equal to zero. NOTE: Not payable on data of calls between transactions
